website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy oval-shaped inspection mirror, but it may be too short for some.
pros: 2-inch by 1-inch oval-shaped mirror with extendable handle
Easy to adjust the angle of the mirror and length of the handle
Good option for inspecting tight spaces
cons: Only extends to 21 inches, so not ideal for reaching far away areas

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: It cant be used for a dental tool. Mirror is too big. But works great for mechanical or electrical trade jobs as an actual inspection tool. Not sure why people havent posted a photo of it, which would be helpful. Thus I posted one. Youre welcome.
customer_reviews.author: OC88

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to some reviews, this is not a "dental" mirror; it's an INSPECTION mirror. The mirror is good glass, with completely adjustable viewing angle and a firm telescoping handle. Perfect for my purpose (peering into guitars), and also for looking under rims inside appliances. To better illuminate the mirror's field, try holding it with a small flashlight pointed at the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Reid

customer_reviews.title: Lash tech approved!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a lash tech.. And i love it! Great quality.. Durability.. And really helps view the lashes without having to lean forward without pulling back the lash and breathing on my client.
customer_reviews.author: Libra Moon

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: This tool works. I use it as an inspection mirror for instruments WHICH IT IS NEARLY TOO LARGE FOR with violins but is good for guitar. Not the greatest quality but works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Great little mirror for the money. Only thing I didn't like is the mirror is attached "crooked". While this does not in any way affect how I use it, it is just a little annoying. Sorry, I just expect perfection I guess. I actually use this in my sewing room to to see how to correctly insert new needles in my long arm sewing machine and to look under the quilt to check out stitching. It is exactly what I needed. Would recommend; would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for inspecting the insides of various things
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for inspecting the insides of various things;rih=ght off the bat it saved me a difficult removal and replacement on a guitar, just to see a part number.
customer_reviews.author: DBlack

customer_reviews.title: I've always had one these large 2" dia. mirrors ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always had one these large 2" dia. mirrors in my tool box and finally broke the one I had for over 20 years. I went everywhere locally to buy a new one. Sears, harbor freight, tool barn, auto zone....everywhere and NOBODY had a 2" mirror. They all only had a 1" dia. Found this on Amazon. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It appears to ok, but i haven't taken it on the road with me to put it to the test for my job. The mirror is oblong, versus round (which i thought it was round form the image i saw on the phone app), which is alright. However, the plastic handle has a very bad chemical smell, which i hope will go away in time.
customer_reviews.author: CordoSherm

customer_reviews.title: Good tool to have
customer_reviews.text: I offered that to my husband who loves to fix my car so it can see what is going on even if the problem is out of reach. This is a telescopic mirror you can keep in your pocket to look behind the fridge or under the furniture. It is useful for mechanics, but even to housewives. It is pretty sturdy for less than 10 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: VeroTop Contributor: Drawing

customer_reviews.title: Look the other way.
customer_reviews.text: 1 star review because it has a tag that clearly said cancer and reproductive harm. If something as benign as a small telescopic mirror has to have this tag, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good mirror for the price I’m a cwi and I use it often Cheaper mirrors will get loose and flop around quickly, these hold position pretty well and it’s big enough to see at a distance
customer_reviews.author: Ben Clark

customer_reviews.title: Guess I'm not meant to be a dentist!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the dental mirror was this big, but that was my fault...I never checked it! But it really doesn't allow me to check the rear molars; UNLESS you have another mirror to reflect the teeth in a larger mirror. Not totally thrilled about it, but guess it does give a 'look-see"!
customer_reviews.author: Dee1

customer_reviews.title: It's an Inspection Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not even sure if I noticed the measurements for the mirror, but it's on a smallish side. Still, the 2x1-inch oval shape should make it easy to slip into tight spaces for inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Jerew

customer_reviews.title: Rarely ever give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely ever give 5 stars but I honestly can’t say anything bad about it, minus the fact that I should’ve got another one because everyone keeps borrowing mine. I use this the see how much brake pad is left when I’m doing inspections. Fits perfect in between the caliper and rim. Telescopes decently far and hasn’t broken yet like they normally do and seperate.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: worth its weight in gold
customer_reviews.text: quality lil inspection mirror full functional swival any direction and has shirt pocket clip saves hour labor when inspecting rear hydraulic disc brake pads on fleet of class 7 trucks and busses. no other way to inspect pad condition unless you want pull dual wheels off .
customer_reviews.author: Transtar 24

customer_reviews.title: good size mirror
customer_reviews.text: Good size. I used it to look through some walls to track wiring with a flash light. Had an older one I lost with a smaller mirror and I really appreciated how this one was larger. Mirror felt pretty clear too, though I might of just been used to the old one. Telescoping and joints were all tight and didn't wobble or have stiff/loose spots.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This device is really small. Put it somewhere close or you’ll lose it. Must have great eyesight to see in the tiny mirror that it’s attached to.
customer_reviews.author: andy spencer

customer_reviews.title: Limitless uses
customer_reviews.text: This folding mirror has all sorts of uses. I needed to see an area of my ear not otherwise visible. The folding aspect somewhat protects the mirror from scratches. It’s too large to be a comfortable dental mirror.
customer_reviews.author: oplorn

customer_reviews.title: Real glass!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a quality mirror with real glass and not that fake mirror decal/sticker. Better quality and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Simple Toolbox Essential
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I always have something I want to see into that is around a corner and I try to use my phone to see. This is definitely easier to work with. The handle has a nice feel. The telescoping is convenient and it gets pretty long when fully extended. Get it for your toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Bosh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: It works great for my purpose, i detached the mirror from its pole and carry it in a coin purse. Works great. Actual glass and no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin O.

customer_reviews.title: poor design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fit into tight spaces, but the mirror glass has a 3/4" extension before the hinge, so if hinged at a 45 degree angle, the mirror needs 1 1/2" of gap...sometimes that limits where I can fit this mirror...
customer_reviews.author: Sven O Brailey

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped me out, while working on a valve cover gasket. The mirror shape provided a better view for areas I could not readily see on the back side of the valve cover.
customer_reviews.author: Mudman

customer_reviews.title: Great litte tool
customer_reviews.text: I have needed one of these mirrors for a long time and this one has already been as handy as I expected. Size is important to me, both for carrying the tool and for reaching it into cramped spaces. I would not want the mirror any larger than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Schultz

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is a bit smaller than I would like ,but it works..you can actually tighten the nut where the mirror swivels to keep it steady
customer_reviews.author: Reynardo Matos

customer_reviews.title: Small and handy
customer_reviews.text: I got these as giveaways since they were so inexpensive. They telescope, mirror pivots around, and they fold up pretty small. Only issue I had with one was the pen clip is actually held on by a tiny screw in the end, and one lost its screw somewhere in transit. One is missing its clip as a result, and I'm surprised the clip didn't fall out of the box too it was packed so loose. So for $2 and change each, they will work fine for little favors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Muench

customer_reviews.title: It's really small.  Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the mirror size more carefully. It's really small. Construction is very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Work well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to see the settings on my air conditioner that is up high. I had to keep a step stool in front of it. I can now easily use the mirror, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M Swisher

customer_reviews.title: Good shape and adjustability.
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing for looking into enclosed spaces. Better, more useful shape than a round mirror, and the ability to adjust the angle and length make it a top choice.
customer_reviews.author: James Carl

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to received this but was disappointed because it fogs up right away the minute I put it in my mouth. It doesn’t give you a suggestion on how to prevent the fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Grace C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Length, A Few Scratches!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is GREAT for what you need it for and it's longer than most you'll find but unfortunately even though it was wrapped well it came with several scratches which kinda sucks and so I had to remove one star!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Great inspection mirror. Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little mirror for the money. Quite flexible and the telescoping feature is perfect for hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P. Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mirror. Seems to be well made. I'm pleased with the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and weak!
customer_reviews.text: Okay this has a cheap toy like feel, and I have to be careful when telescoping in or out not to harm the fragile tubing. It's done what it's supposed to so far. It reminds me of a cheap telescoping antenna like the ones on little cheap radios that would break just by trying to adjust for your favorite station. It's okay, but I'm going to have to coddle it for it's predictably short life span. Not my favorite tool.
customer_reviews.author: Totally ImAussieBull

customer_reviews.title: Great sized mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great basic mirror. Holds its position well & the oval shape makes it perfect to get into tight areas
customer_reviews.author: Yazato

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping to use for my lash business, didn't last past the first two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lara

customer_reviews.title: It's a Good Size
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is longer than wider and offers a better viewing area. I've found when I hold a small flashlight in my left hand and the mirror in my right hand, I can see a whole lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mirror is good, telescoping gets stuck sometimes
customer_reviews.text: I am a dental student and I bought this mirror to practice for my licensing exam, because my classmates recommended it to see both teeth in a bridge prep. It works for the use I am intending it for, but I knocked off one star because the telescoping action is kind of sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Carlborg

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a daily basis as an inspector in a repair shop. The hinges became a little loose but can be tightened. Telescopic feature still works great. Coworkers would offer confused for their Snap-On mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Benton

customer_reviews.title: Inspection Mirror
customer_reviews.text: The inspection mirror with telescoping capabilities is very functional and the size of the mirror works well in tight spaces and has good tilting capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: SCid93

customer_reviews.title: Wayyy to small!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is tiny. Idk how anyone can see anything with this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: DaveTheMechanic

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep in service bags. I have a mirror handy in each service bag and one in my torch set.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome little gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little gadget. It came very handy when we were connecting a cable to the back of our very large TV. Didn't need to move the TV as the mirror allowed us to see the back.
customer_reviews.author: R Ogborn Platt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality except for the plastic handle
customer_reviews.text: Good quality except for the plastic handle. I wish it had a protective case because it's fragile and vulnerable in a toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Laramie Rich

customer_reviews.title: Can see those hard to reach places
customer_reviews.text: In hvac these mirrors are a needed commodity. They will not last very long but these are great and cheap! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Head Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The tool quality is goo, but the head is too small for the kind of automotive work I do.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R

customer_reviews.title: This thing is the bomb.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use while geocaching. Who knew the first day I would use it to retrieve a cat toy from behind the couch? Maybe I need another one...
customer_reviews.author: SnafoooTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: But it still works and has held up fine.
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is a little larger than I wanted to inspect brake pads without removing the tire. But it still works and has held up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Auto Mechanic Approved
customer_reviews.text: The telescoping part is the usual that you’ve seen before but the mirror has a wider field of view that is helpful for looking at something accurately. Don’t know why I haven’t seen this shape before.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Wierzenski

customer_reviews.title: Nice big mirror
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a slight scratch on the mirror but no big, it still works as a mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It's a lil mirror on a stick, showed me wear I was leaking from, fixed it this thing just folds up and sits w my other tools waiting for its next project
customer_reviews.author: ✋️

customer_reviews.title: Durable and useful
customer_reviews.text: In the HVAC business this is a mist have, this tool is very durable and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Aquios

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works well. nice and secure when extended stays in the position you put it in. Will buy again when I crack this one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: As a auto tech this is a necessary tool . Its half the price of a (tool salesman)! You do the math
customer_reviews.author: roger hartford

customer_reviews.title: Meet my needs
customer_reviews.text: It's alright and did the job I needed. But is flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: A nice mirror for work in between walls
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is a fantastic size for sticking in the wall between joists. The telescoping feature is also very nice. It might be a touch wobbly where the mirror attached to the telescoping pole, but is still quite usable.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Tanner

customer_reviews.title: I would totally buy again
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a lash mirror and it works great
customer_reviews.author: HabibiMink

customer_reviews.title: i wish it could telescope about 3 inches longer and ...
customer_reviews.text: i wish it could telescope about 3 inches longer and that the mirror was a tiny bit bigger, not a big deal but... that would of made a difference
customer_reviews.author: blaster

customer_reviews.title: works as you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Important tool to have accessible when working on the car. Great price as well
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I find that while adjusting the mirror, often I might add, the bolt loosens up and can get lost
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: I use this all the time.
customer_reviews.text: The telescoping feature makes all the difference. I have three inspection mirrors, but I use this one the most because I can position where the mirror is, rather than choke-up on the handle, making it more convenient & comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good inspection mirror. Good price Same quality as the tool truck
customer_reviews.author: audrey bryer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for eyelash extension artists and for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear view. Perfect size for my HVAC tool bag. Seems as strong as expected. Good buy. Ty
customer_reviews.author: justinb

customer_reviews.title: Small size.
customer_reviews.text: I like the small size (1 1/8"diameter) of this mirror to get into small places. I have another larger one for more open spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Willo

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you’ll like it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. It’s pretty much identical to the Blue Point one I bought. I liked it so much I bought a second one for side jobs at home.
customer_reviews.author: I fix things

customer_reviews.title: Item exactly as described...but pay attention to the mirror dimensions
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it said it is. The mirror was smaller than I had imagined, but I didn't do the due diligence of actually verifying the published measurements.
customer_reviews.author: chad tobler

customer_reviews.title: its fine
customer_reviews.text: handle could be better/thicker/ easier to grab with gloves on
customer_reviews.author: Ilya R.

customer_reviews.title: I can see everything I need to see everywhere I need to look.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fast shipping, well packaged, nice seller, and good price for value. Strong and good length
customer_reviews.author: sci f.

customer_reviews.title: It's a mirror. It telescopes.
customer_reviews.text: Should have ponied up for something more useful. The mirror is quite small, so when you telescope it, it's difficult to put whatever you're looking at in context of the area you're looking into. Also, I should have gotten one with a light on it... if the mirror is looking somewhere that's not as bright as the surroundings, you really can't see anything. Only $5 wasted, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Grey

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I use this to look at eggs and hatchlings in bird nest boxes - I would not be able to see them without this handy tool...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use it as an inspection mirror on small bore Pipe..
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if I would like the oval shape of the mirror but I love it
customer_reviews.author: Todd D

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and inexpensive. I keep breaking these in my toolbag so I bought a couple to have a spare on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Pocket mirror.
customer_reviews.text: It's a mirror, it seems sturdy and telescopes good and I haven't broken it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Vagabond014

customer_reviews.title: Received it really fast.
customer_reviews.text: Received it really fast. Identical to the 1 i already have from the tool truck for a few dollars cheaper
customer_reviews.author: audrey bryer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Used for cleaning rim jets under toilet lid. Worked well. Constructed well. Will use for other things I'm sure. Super deal.
customer_reviews.author: William Raiford

customer_reviews.title: Works and is good quality. But is a bit too big for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works and is good quality. But is a bit too big for what i needed it for. But it works
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Mirror edges chipped. Not well finished at all. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: FogNamedKarl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this telescoping mirror works great for a small and difficult areas, but the sight is limited, material is good
customer_reviews.author: fugimaster

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very small, but works for what we need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Long

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping mirror
customer_reviews.text: If you don't need to illuminate the area being viewed, this is ok. I'd recommend a lighted mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its small, but I needed a small mirror. Read the reviews first, this is for tight areas.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan DuVall

customer_reviews.title: great price, fast shipping will order again
customer_reviews.text: great price ,fast shipping will order again.Thank you.excellent quality ,no hassle installation
customer_reviews.author: Italo L.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, and does what it claims.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool for reaching into those tight spots that I can’t normally see.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McNutt

customer_reviews.title: Inspiration mirror
customer_reviews.text: Was just want I wanted to check thing that are hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Konczal

customer_reviews.title: Inspecting brake pads
customer_reviews.text: Dropped this several times n it hasn't broke. When it does I will buy another. Use it often :D
customer_reviews.author: Victor Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is ok, nothing stand out for $8 worth of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Evan S.

customer_reviews.title: I used it to check my cam adjuster on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it to check my cam adjuster on my 1982 Honda GL500I motorcycle , maybe a little long but fit through the 30mm inspection hole.
customer_reviews.author: God

customer_reviews.title: Loose connections
customer_reviews.text: Telescoping metal pieces came too loose to support the mirror. At any length extension, the mirror just flops around. Not really usable in that condition.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made...
customer_reviews.text: Well Made, Good quality. Easy to adjust, Great for looking into small places.
customer_reviews.author: AMA 5326

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The smaller size of the mirror is just what I needed. Appears to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: STANLEY H BEECH

customer_reviews.title: is good
customer_reviews.text: I'm a plumber and you have to check behind small holes and it works like you speck

customer_reviews.title: BROKE
customer_reviews.text: the mrirror doesnt stay where you want it, it falls all the time and then it fell apart
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sellner

customer_reviews.title: best compact mirror for your $$$
customer_reviews.text: Been using these professionally for a while now. They are a must have, the size of the mirror allows for inspection of compact areas. solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: John Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror shape
customer_reviews.text: Nice rectangular mirror shape. Fits into small areas very well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymooose user

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is meant to do. It's a small mirror, so consider it for tight places. If you don't have restrictions, you might want something larger. Think of it as the size of a dental mirror.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a mirror. What else can one say? Good product. Works well. Good price

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ! It’s great for lash techs and affordable
